title: E-commerce Platform
description: My proudest project so far, I engineered a custom web platform with flexible data models, full e‑commerce and CMS features, and automated workflows to turn complexity into a smooth user experience. On the infrastructure side, I secured and tuned a bare‑metal VPS with Nginx and built a Bash‑driven CI/CD pipeline that reduced deployment time and downtime. To top it off, I automated product data collection with Python, accelerating catalog creation and freeing the team from repetitive work.

title: Manufacturer's Online Showroom
description: Built a sleek static Vue.js showroom that let clients easily browse and share product information, strengthening the company's digital presence and supporting early sales growth.

title: This very Portfolio
description: A responsive portfolio website built with Vue.js

title: Expense Tracker
description: Woke up one day and decided to act like an adult, built an expense tracker to stop wasting money on useless things like groceries.

title: Content Management System
description: A content management website I built for my final year project, powered by Wagtail.

title: Chat Application
description: An exploration sandbox diving into headless frameworks: DRF (JWT, serialization, media/static file management), Vue with Axios, Pinia, and other plugins. Also built a live chatroom using WebSockets between the two.

title: Django Starter
description: A maximalist Django 5.2 starter packed with optional Bootstrap 5.3, Font Awesome 6, theme toggle, full settings, demo templates, and handy quality-of-life features.

title: Electron js Starter
description: A minimalist setup to quickly scaffold an Electron app using Vue 3 and TypeScript.

title: Metal slug
description: This was a 4fun project where i recreated a childhood retro game champion selection screen

title: DRF Starter
description: A minimalist setup to quickly scaffold a Django Rest Framework API using HttpOnly cookies for authentication setup.

title: Finance utility app
description: an independent effort for a fully contained offline app that aims to streamline financial processes and enhance user experience for government services.

title: Showroom/E-commerce
description: A static presentation website for local business to showcase decoration and furniture services
